name: Operations Orchestrator Agent
description: Multi-agent orchestrator for incident management, ticket creation, and team coordination across GitHub and Jira platforms

skills.name: Incident Management
skills.description: Comprehensive incident response coordination including automated ticket creation, status tracking, and escalation management across Jira and GitHub

skills.name: Jira Issue Management
skills.description: Create, update, and manage Jira issues with full lifecycle support including transitions, priority management, and assignment

skills.name: GitHub Issue Management
skills.description: Manage GitHub repository issues including creation, updates, labeling, assignment, and state management

skills.name: Cross-Platform Coordination
skills.description: Synchronize and coordinate issues across GitHub and Jira platforms, ensuring consistent tracking and communication

skills.name: Repository Content Management
skills.description: Manage GitHub repository content including file creation, updates, and documentation for incident response procedures

skills.name: Label and Categorization Management
skills.description: Create and manage labels across GitHub repositories for better issue categorization and tracking

skills.name: Workflow Automation
skills.description: Automate incident response workflows including issue state transitions, assignments, and escalation procedures

skills.name: Team Coordination and Assignment
skills.description: Coordinate team responses, manage assignments, and facilitate communication across development and operations teams

skills.name: Incident Tracking and Reporting
skills.description: Track incident progress, generate status reports, and maintain comprehensive incident documentation

skills.name: Escalation Management
skills.description: Manage incident escalation processes including priority adjustments, stakeholder notifications, and timeline management
